item.description:
Ok lets all head out and listen to some music and shake, wiggle, rock and roll, we are the best group around when it comes to HAVING FUN

 

When you come in ask the Hostess for" Eva's table",  food is very good and reasonable, they usuually have good food price buster specials two dinners for twenty which includes salad and a dessert to split amongst each other,  " I will get there by 6:30pm" . Feel free to bring guests just include it it your RSVP,  we are a very friendly group and love to meet new people.

DINNER GUESTS- Please be firm with your RSVP and show up on time to eat.

Dancing guests- sorry we cannot guarantee seating during the dinner hour .

Please to all don't sign up if you are not firm, I have updated the RSVP DEADLINE.

 

 



No cover charge if you get in before 8:30pm and enjoy our menu while listening to your favorite band or watching your favorite team on one of our many screens, all the way up to midnight.

 

Band  Souled Out Showband

Time 9:30pm-1am

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dancing live band "Souled Out Showband"
